points.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
points.analysis:
There are multiple language options for the privacy police. Ej:
Spanish: https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=es
English: https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en
France: https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=41&category=1000021150&knowledge=1060295165&language=fr

case.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
case.localized_title: Les conditions de ce service sont traduites en plusieurs langues
case.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.analysis:
I cant annotate 2 points on a same paragraph, in the privaty policy you can read that... "Information including user name, address, phone number, and email address, will be collected at the time of user registration on the Site. If you are registering an AliExpress account through social media platforms
such as Facebook or Twitter, we may collect your account name and profile photo at those platforms. 

·If you choose to answer our supplemental questionnaires for registered members, we may also collect marital status, nationality, gender, date and/or year of birth, annual income, monthly spending and user preferences.

If you prefer not to provide such information, the use of our services and products will not be affected.

" You can see that the service collects multiple personal data

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: Le service recueille différents types de données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en), it states that:
"Third parties that are engaged by us to provide verification services,such as conducting suitable money laundering, fraud and “Know Your Customer” checks on Buyers and Sellers. This may include your name, email address, company details and contact information."

case.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: De nombreux tiers sont impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en), there's a new point(D. Retention) that it states that:

"For example, if you are a registered member, certain data will be retained for a length of time following termination or deletion of your account, in order to comply with applicable laws or in case of disputes"

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Ce service peut conserver des données à caractère personnel après une demande d'effacement pour des raisons d'intérêt commercial ou d'obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
points.analysis: The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in the first line after the title that is "(Effective as of September 9, 2020)", this information is valid at 13/11/2020

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des conditions.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

case.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
case.localized_title: Le service n'autorise pas les comptes alternatifs
case.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

points.title: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future

case.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
case.localized_title: Le service peut distribuer votre contenu par le biais de tous les médias connus aujourd'hui ou à l'avenir.

points.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en":

"If we collect and use your personal information in reliance on our legitimate interests (or those of any third party), this interest will normally be to operate our Platform and services, manage our relationship with you and communicate with you as necessary to provide our services to you and for our legitimate commercial interest, for instance, when responding to your queries, improving our Platform and our services, undertaking marketing, or for the purposes of ensuring the security of our Platform and services and detecting or preventing illegal activities such as fraud. We may have other legitimate interests and if appropriate we will make clear to you at the relevant time what those legitimate interests are."

case.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il collecte les données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

points.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches
points.analysis: The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en). The privacy policy establishes in "Security Measures" that:"Upon becoming aware of a data breach, we will notify you and the regulatory authorities in accordance with the timescales and scope required by applicable data protection law".

case.title: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches
case.localized_title: Les services informeront les utilisateurs si des données personnelles ont été affectées par des violations de données.
case.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.

points.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "Legal Basis for Data Processing" that:

"If we ask you to provide personal information to comply with a legal requirement or to enter into a contract with you, we will make this clear at the relevant time and advise you whether the provision of your personal information is mandatory or not (as well as of the possible consequences if you do not provide your personal information). In some instances, you may be required to provide us with personal information for processing as described above, in order for us to be able to provide you all of our services, and for you to use all the features of our Platform."

case.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
case.localized_title: Le service promet d'informer et/ou de notifier les utilisateurs au sujet des enquêtes gouvernementales susceptibles d'impliquer les données personnelles des utilisateurs
case.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in "Why we use cookies?" that:

"We also use cookies to enable us to track and target the interests of Platform visitors to enhance the experience on our Platform by researching visiting patterns and conducting interest-based advertising; assisting our partners in tracking user visits to the Platforms; and to track progress and participation in promotions and the success of our email marketing campaigns. We use first and third party cookies for these purposes."

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: This service tracks you on other websites
points.analysis: The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in "What about other tracking technologies, like web beacons?" that: " These are tiny graphics files that contain a unique identifier that enable us to recognise when someone has visited our Platform or opened an e-mail that we have sent them. This allows us, for example, to monitor the traffic patterns of users from one page within our Platform to another".

case.title: This service tracks you on other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous suit sur d'autres sites web
case.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.analysis: The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in "What about other tracking technologies, like web beacons?" that: "These are tiny graphics files that contain a unique identifier that enable us to recognise when someone has visited our Platform or opened an e-mail that we have sent them. This allows us, for example, to monitor the traffic patterns of users from one page within our Platform to another, to deliver or communicate with cookies, to understand whether you have come to our Platform from an online advertisement displayed on a third-party website,"

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "Your Rights" that:

"The right to complain to a data protection authority about our collection and use of your personal information. For more information, please contact your local data protection authority."

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Le service propose un mécanisme de réclamation pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in the table below:

"Social Networking Cookies: These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content that you find interesting on our Platform through third party social networking and other websites.These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes too."

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Le service utilise des cookies/pixels de médias sociaux
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
points.analysis:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in the table cell about "Analytics Cookies:" in the last column it is written that:
"To refuse these cookies, please follow the instructions below under the heading "How can I control cookies?" "

case.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers, mais avec des instructions d'exclusion.

points.title: This service receives your location through GPS coordinates
points.analysis: The privacy policy establishes in "Information That We Collect Automatically:" that "Specifically this collected information may include IP addresses, device type, unique device identification numbers, browser type, broad geographic location (e.g. country or city-level location)".

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.localized_title: Ce service reçoit votre position par le biais des coordonnées GPS
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

case.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
case.localized_title: Ce service interdit aux utilisateurs de tenter d'obtenir un accès non autorisé à d'autres systèmes informatiques
case.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
case.localized_title: Le tribunal qui régit les conditions est situé dans une juridiction moins favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

points.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur le type d'informations collectées.
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: First-party cookies are used

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Utilisation de cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

case.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
case.localized_title: Des cookies de tiers sont utilisés, mais avec des instructions d'exclusion.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Certaines données personnelles peuvent être conservées dans l'intérêt de l'entreprise ou pour répondre à des obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Les en-têtes Do Not Track (DNT) sont ignorés et vous êtes suivi de toute façon même si vous avez défini cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès, la correction et/ou la suppression de vos données
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

case.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
case.localized_title: Le service prétend être conforme à la CCPA pour les utilisateurs californiens.
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

case.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, mais vous recevrez une notification des modifications.
case.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
